previous.excerpt:
Hey everyone,

A year ago, I started building a program that scrapes Reddit and Twitter for
emerging stocks.

In 2020, it allowed me to pick up stocks such as PLUG, PENN or NET very early -
bought in respectively at $3, $10 and $20.

In 2021, I did a little experiment and decided to invest only in…
previous.title: I let a program pick my stocks for 1 month. Portfolio up 40%
